name: Taivas (itch)
description:
This is a slowly developing open world RPG that serves as a playable world in which the rest of my games take place. This project will receive regular updates on Monday evenings.

THIS IS BY NO MEANS A RELEASE OF ANY KIND. This is mostly posted for easy testing.

That said, if people start playing this, please give me as much feedback as possible. Not only do I need that feedback to improve the game, but I would also love to include any testers into the game, especially if they find particularly amusing bugs/glitches.
